1: Custom ID have higher priority than auto-id
//- - - - - - - - -//
## Title 1

Title 1 setext
--------------

## Title 2 ^good-2

Title 2 setext ^good-2-setext
--------------

## Title 3 ^bad-3 !

Title 3 setext ^bad-3 !
--------------
//- - - - - - - - -//
<h2 id="title-1">Title 1</h2>
<h2 id="title-1-setext">Title 1 setext</h2>
<h2 id="^good-2">Title 2</h2>
<h2 id="^good-2-setext">Title 2 setext</h2>
<h2 id="title-3-bad-3-">Title 3 ^bad-3 !</h2>
<h2 id="title-3-setext-bad-3-">Title 3 setext ^bad-3 !</h2>
//= = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = = =//
